description: One pot is all you need for this speedy dinner, making the clean up even faster. Try this budget-friendly chicken soup with mushrooms, chilli and lime.
keywords: Chicken soup,Seafood free,Egg free,Chicken dishes,Weeknight dinner,Chicken,Apr 2022,Sesame free,Dairy free,Mushroom
name: Speedy Hot & Sour Chicken Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 carrot, halved lengthways, thinly sliced diagonally
1 bunch choy sum, trimmed, roughly chopped
3 limes, juiced (save 1 lime, cut into wedges, to serve)
2 tbs Woolworths unsalted peanuts, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Cook chicken, breaking up lumps with a wooden spoon, for 5 minutes or until lightly browned and cooked through.

Add mushroom, carrot, stock, soy, sugar and half of the chilli, then bring to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, uncovered, for 2 minutes to allow flavours to infuse. Add choy sum, then simmer for 2 minutes or until tender. Stir in lime juice.
Ladle soup into bowls. Top with coriander, peanuts and remaining chilli. Serve with extra lime wedges.
